name: frostpane
description: A customizable frosted glass effect CSS library with backdrop blur and modern aesthetics

scripts.build:full:min: sass src/frostpane.scss dist/frostpane.tmp.css --style=compressed && postcss dist/frostpane.tmp.css -o dist/frostpane.css && rm dist/frostpane.tmp.css
scripts.build:full:unmin: sass src/frostpane.scss dist/frostpane.unminified.tmp.css --style=expanded && postcss dist/frostpane.unminified.tmp.css -o dist/frostpane.unminified.css --no-map && rm dist/frostpane.unminified.tmp.css
scripts.build:core:min: sass src/frostpane-core.scss dist/frostpane-core.tmp.css --style=compressed && postcss dist/frostpane-core.tmp.css -o dist/frostpane-core.css && rm dist/frostpane-core.tmp.css
scripts.build:core:unmin: sass src/frostpane-core.scss dist/frostpane-core.unminified.tmp.css --style=expanded && postcss dist/frostpane-core.unminified.tmp.css -o dist/frostpane-core.unminified.css --no-map && rm dist/frostpane-core.unminified.tmp.css

author: Cameron Rye <c@meron.io>
